casebody.data:
Vance JOHNSON
v.
COMMISSIONER OF CORRECTION Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided November 8, 2016

Arnold V. Amore, assigned counsel, in support of the petition.

Kathryn W. Bare, assistant state's attorney, in opposition.

The petitioner Vance Johnson's petition for certification for appeal from the Appellate Court, 168 Conn.App. 294, 145 A.3d 416 (2016), is denied.
